I wanted so desperately a game where you can play as a buncha teenagers or the psycho who will subsequently kill them. I think we all did at one point. This concept is still pretty fresh so I can forgive this game's shortcomings in some ways. Unfortunately, what I can't get over is this game's complete lack of depth and feel. 

As it stands currently there is only one game mode. Flip on a bunch of generators using QTE's and run circles through windows to outrun the psycho and escape. I don't think this is the sort of game people thought of when they heard "1v4 where YOU play the killer!" and it's left a sour taste in my mouth. It's just a quickmatch arena game that could have any kind of subject matter and not feel out of place. Replace all the assets with literally anything else and it'd be the same game. Nothing was done to hammer the "YOU play the killer!" part. At no point does this game feel like an 80's slasher flick. You're just in a field switching on generators to power a door that'll let you leave. It doesn't make sense. Why are they even there in the first place? Why do you need this many generators just to open a door? I can only handle so much suspension of disbelief before it just completely destroys my immersion. This is what disappointed me the most.

If this game were actually a lot of fun then I could forget all that and just have a good time. Unfortunately I didn't find it fun in the least. There's nothing fun about waiting at a generator for minutes on end performing really limp QTEs. This basically encompasses the entire gameplay for the survivors. The killer's just a bit more fun but unfortunately I can never find a game where I can play as one since that's what everyone else wants to do and I don't blame them. You either get plucked off within seconds of joining or you have to suffer through QTEs and button mashing. 

And don't even get me started on the bugs. I'll leave it to the other reviews to handle all that. Bugs can be fixed. The gameplay, however, will not.

To conclude. There's no immersion, nothing makes sense, it's not even fun and the whole thing just feels like they cobbled it all together so they could be one of the firsts to make a game with that "play as the killer!" premise. If they could add a few more gamemodes and take out those daming QTEs then I'd give this game another shot. Until then I can't recommend it.

我见过唯一一个敢涨价的游戏，就凭这个，我给满分

游戏时间：200小时。
感受如下：
优点：优秀的游戏创意，低用户门槛。
缺点：1、无处不在的加速挂，让你根本无法带着愉快的心情进行游戏。特别是近期，由于官方的无能，导致加速横行，基本每一局都 有加速，根本无法玩，让我有怒删这游戏的冲动。
          2、开发团队对用户毫无尊重和应有的责任心。导致用户大量的反馈被无视，从本质上拉低了这款游戏的得分和友好度。

综上，差评。

游戏一直玩的很好，自从出了官方汉化，槽点太多不知从何吐起。

 
“准备”的反义词是“尚未准备就绪”
难道不是“取消准备”更好一点？
 
大张伟名字“jake park”
park明显是“朴”姓的英文写法吧（而且官方人设里也说了大张伟是个亚裔小哥，姓朴很正常）。
官方汉化把大张伟名字翻译成“杰克·公园” ……
好，小学生也知道park是公园的意思，但在人名翻译的时候就算官汉组不知道是“杰克·朴”至少也该音译成“杰克·帕克”好吗（杰克·停车表示不服）……
 
我知道了汉化组小学课本学到的【Mr Green】不是【格林先生】，而是【绿先生】。
 
然后至于“开启逃生大门”完全可以翻成“开门”，让人感觉官汉组根本没做事，很像直接复制英文黏贴到网页翻译器里直翻了。
  

我给官汉组0分。
 


————————————我是分割线————————————

 
我总结为：修复了旧bug 又出现了新bug 此游戏的bug绵绵无绝期 over


———————　我是2017.7.8分割线　——————

今天给这游戏改差评。
以前大家当玩笑一样说买bug送了个游戏。

但现在每次出bug，官方的态度是几天不修复，修复旧bug又出新bug。
开黑组队的bug一直存在，浪费一群人的时间排队几小时也玩不了一把，我们的时间也很宝贵好吗？
作为黎明杀机第一批玩家，2016年6月开始玩，非常热爱支持杀机，游戏时间作证，也买了全部的dlc。但是！
 
你们真的有好好优化游戏吗？
你们制作组就这态度对玩家吗？

今天和小伙伴开黑，只要是建房房主一开游戏就会掉线，我们四个人排队排了两小时一局都没玩成。

一直没有真正的动过气，大家都很忙，难得约了三个好基友一起开黑，结果一整晚只换来不断的掉线。
真的失望了。
 
 
------------------------我是２０１８分割线----------------------------


现在游戏优化的超级流畅　组队也是秒进

我玩了２年还是觉得很好玩！我爱杀鸡！


[h1]------------------------2018 年底 单排上分分割线-----------------------------

第二次改差评。

我是个２０１６年游戏刚出就入坑，只玩人类的１０００小时老玩家。

这个游戏削弱人类９９９次，削弱屠夫０次。

玩的好照样能上１段没错，死了也有两万分没错，现在把人类削的跟狗一样，我趴着上１段，每次死了看记分板哦两万分，哦加豆了，但我玩的贼他妈不开心好吗？虽然能打到１段，但数数看跑出去的次数特别特别少。我们在乎的不是分段，是游戏玩的开不开心。让你死一晚上就算１段又怎么样？你开心？操你妈，听到没有，操你妈！

各种老年翻窗，取消无敌房，大量减少板子，翻板稍微歪一点稍微远一点就翻不下来，屠夫４０米长刀，隔着窗子一个身位都被砍到，屠夫各种透视技能，处决技能，托节奏技能，两步一根钩，如果不是血祭品，被屠夫抱摔２次直接上钩毁灭打击都摇不出来？人类拔线给屠夫加分，屠夫拔线人类有时候还要扣一颗豆？？我玩你妈臭嗨？？？
　

以前没削人类的时候，玩的好的屠夫不是照样瞬间四杀？？？我的朋友刚玩，玩人类跟我玩了快半个月了，还没找到游戏体验，别说萌新了，我这个老人皇都感觉玩个游戏玩的一头火。
现在的屠夫是多菜要加强到这样？稍微遛几下砸几下手电筒照几下就要被卡位鞭尸，怎么不处理一下低能脑瘫屠夫的这种行为？出去还用拼音骂人，对这种人我想说你妈死了。
　
屠夫本来就是可以发泄情绪的角色，就算很菜也能砍到人追到人，菜到砍不到人追不到人的终极菜Ｂ不配玩游戏好吗？
而人类本来就是弱势角色，被追杀还要一直被削弱。
之前因为ｂｕｇ太多弃坑大半年。优化的不错回来玩，发现人类被削的惨不忍睹。我们这种只玩人类的玩家真的是无话可说。准备继续弃坑了。

希望黎明杀机的屠夫拿实力说话，别跟个吃奶的宝宝一样要一直削人类才能玩。
仅此而已。

差评。什么时候加强人类什么时候好评。[/h1]

Asymmetrical games have been popping up more frequently ever since Evolve tanked it, and Dead by Daylight is one of those games that does the genre proud. It's not perfect, but nothing is. The sooner you learn to accept that fact; the easier your life will be. 

 This game does a really good job of balancing risk and reward as well as critical thinking and understanding. It's not just about survival; it's about weighing your options. Is it worth it to risk your life to save your teammate? Is it worth his to save yours? What do you value more- your dignity or your skin? The killer plays the game in first person perspective while the survivors are given a third person perspective, and this spearpoint of a mechanic sets the tone for the entire game. As the killer your greatest weapon(besides a jagged machete and rusty beartrap) is thinking like your prey. Knowing where they'll run, where they'll hide- how they'll react to the actions you take. As a survivor; there are two things that will get you killed faster than anything else. 1) Panic. 2) Movement. By abusing blind spots, vision cones, and the most basic forms of camoflouge and deception- survivors can evade or escape the killer to live another day. 

The question remains... 






Will you be dead by doorknobs?

*cough, I mean daylight. Seriously though; it's a very fun game.

Well. To start, I absolutely fucking loved this game! But, I also fucking hated it. Actually, that's strill trye now. But more on the love side less on the hate. Reason for that? The lurning curve isn't a lurning curve; It's a lurning sheer drop. But once you get the hang of it, as survivor and killer, with a pinch of luck, the game is awesome. Of course, the game is still riddled in bugs glitches and crashes, and a lot of them can screw you over. (eg loss of rank, bloodpoints etc.)

So after playing dozens of hours more of this game, I am switching my negative review to a positive one. I would definitely recommend this game, and it's an amazing game to play with friends.

Just two things that will make you bash every little key of your keyboard out:
-Camping killers (Seriously? You want that kill so bad? don't look at him chin to chin, just roam around until some survivor tries to free him! You might even get a dual kill!)
-Juke cheesing survivors (A lot of killers use this as an excuse for camping hooks. Although I don't believe that to be a valid excuse, it needs to stop. If this happens to you as a killer, just walk away rather than spend time with these 12 year olds. And by the way, juke cheesing is basically going around in a circle, jumping over windows that killers take longer to do, in an endless chain of not being caught.)

-Oh a third thing - Bugs. If you don't like unsquashed bugs, give this game a few weeks or months before playing it :)

Игра очень интересна с точки зрения выживания и стелса в мультиплеере. Задумка реализована просто гениально. Вариантивность игровых стилей впечатляет. Прокачка персонажей присутствует, впрочем, как и система ранкеда. 

Однако все положительные аспекты с лихвой перекрывают недостатки. Захотев поиграть, вы сразу столкнетесь с огромной массой проблем, то у вас не находит игру (приходится постоянно кликать кнопку "готов"), что весьма проблематично (особенно когда люди предпочитают заняться другими делами во время поиска игры), если вам все-таки повезло и вы попали в лобби, маньяк может по мановению пальца распустить лобби, тем самым заставив вас испытать муки поиска снова. Количество персонажей достаточно, но кастомизация практически отсутствует, а у маньяка ее вообще нет. Система баланса ужасна. Ок, вы зашли в игру и настроились насладиться игрой с другом, однако, против вас может попасться маньяк с огромной массой скиллов и всяких прочих фишек, в итоге вы не понимая, что происходит отлетаете от него за 5 минут, попутно поражаясь как могли по вам попасть, если вы перепрыгнули укрытие и уже успели отбежать метра на 3. Постоянные баги с анимациями, вырываясь с плеча маньяка вы легко можете выпасть туда, где вы не могли находиться. Из игры вас легко может кикнуть, при этом вы естественно потеряете ранг, который зарабатывали потом и кровью.

Итог: Игра сырая, как весла после академической гребли. Покупать рекомендуется, если перечисленные выше факторы вас не смущают или вы до безумия любите хорроры и скупаете все, что с ними связано.

I really wanted to like this game but the opposite happened. I can honestly say this is one of the top 10 worst games i have ever played. In theory this game could be a masterpiece but its not. Infact this game has many issues that i do not believe the developers could fix even if they wanted to.
 
Heres how a typical game goes:
1. Survivor goes down......killer pitches a tent and makes a campfire and starts camping the hook like he just found a legendary pokemon in the survivors asshole.
2. You get put on a hook and number 1 repeats OR your team is off circle jerking on the other side of the map.
3. Since the killer is host you lag like no tommorow cause the host is connected to his neighborhood walmart customer service center.
4. You are working on a generator and your team decides to pop the generators like its the 4th of july.


Pros to this game
1. the concept.


in conclusion dont waste your money cause this game is literal trash.

Ce jeu est vraiment cool, vraiment très cool. Mais bordel qu'est ce qu'il est mal optimisé !!!!!! C'est un vrai scandale, une honte même ! 

J'ai pourtant une bonne config (i7 , GTX770, 16Go de Ram , ect ect) et le jeu rame encore alors que je suis en Moyen et 50% de résolution. Et pourtant j'ai désactivé la V-Sync dans le fichier .ini . Je tournerais à 30 FPS, passe encore, mais la la moitié de mes parties se font en 20 25 FPS. Je le répète : UNE HONTE !

Bref, je ne recommande pas ce jeu pour le moment, bien trop mal optimisé et bugué. Mais dans le fond il est cool , c'est dommage.

Edit : Maintenant tout va pour le mieux pour ma part, à part les recherches de Salon quant on est plusieurs... Pour le reste c'est du tout bon ! Bisous !

2018.6.25更新
坚持不断地更新调整平衡性，修复bug，新出的dlc也算诚意满满。虽然我主玩人类而对于不断削人类不很满意，但总体而言制作组的努力有目共睹。

今日将差评改成好评，希望制作组再接再厉。（发现改测评会清除此前其他用户的评价）

12.9更新
最新的DLC推荐大家都别买。
1. 新出的内容上，人类纯废柴，屠夫除了守尸无敌和吓人别无所长
2. 最近游戏更新，不知道制作组的脑子在哪里
A大幅削了弹射
B废了小游戏。
C无敌房削改虽然我是赞成的，但封窗机制减少成3次，并且地形微改在窗前加了不少障碍物以加长路程，这两者本来取其一即可有效遏制无敌点，但同时发生体现了开发商的无脑。
D手电突然变得无敌了紫手电带附件0.1秒瞎，于是制作组可以说：“你看我们没有光削人类！屠夫也削了哦！所以很平衡！”呵呵
E新屠夫无论毁灭打击还是普通挣脱都几乎没有硬直
F等等等一堆的恶心人bug和不平衡
失望，没必要继续给制作组送钱了
Don't buy the new DLC. The content itself is a piece of S-H-I-T. And the recent update of those buff and debuff was a joke. They should work hard on balancing and reducing bugs rather than being greedy on money.

真的只能给差评了，游戏确实是好游戏，模式极具吸引力，可玩性十足，同时收集血点慢慢升级获得想要的技能也有养成的元素。

然而，朋友打了三大妈汉化补丁，然后被封了。没错，就是这么简单，没有作弊，没有改档，打了补丁，马上加入不了游戏，几天后收到被封的消息。看到开发商回复他人的邮件中所谓“我们在封禁问题上处理时间较长，小心谨慎，以免误封任何一个玩家”。简直可笑。找了mods，表示无法处理，让发邮件给EAC，然而EAC从不回复。直接发邮件给开发商，得到的都是废话。ok，放弃了，听天由命。只是可惜了这款好游戏，老老实实游戏的居然被所谓“从不犯错的VAC”封了，大批改档的即便证据确凿被举报了，却仍然逍遥游戏中

8.11补充
是我朋友需要打补丁，这无可厚非。被封的也是他，而不是我。打补丁也是在游戏官方汉化发布之前。我没有受任何影响，只是吐槽罢了。小作坊，小游戏，期望不能太高。Again，游戏本身确实很出色

8.12补充
拜托留言的各位，请别给自己的家乡或者国人丢脸，注意智商...看清贴子内容再回复，被封的不是我。很好奇现在还有多少人坚信“没作弊没开挂没改档，就不会被封”？不真正清楚事情真相，就请不要随便乱喷带节奏。如果不是我朋友的经历，我也不相信真有这么不讲理的误封。我朋友背着我开挂了？我们几乎一起打了每一局，他把把人类1血是开了加速挂么...偷偷改档没告诉我？每一局结束后的技能大家都能看到，带个1级看箱子的是改档了么...3DM的汉化补丁2G多，我也觉得奇怪，不过封了就封了，并没有怪3DM，毕竟无偿在给大家提供着汉化，只是对于开发商的不作为很不满，你说你误封了，好歹给个审核封禁认真处理申诉的态度吧，怎么弄得和路人一个水平。

我们的网络暴民真可怕。什么，城管暴力执法小贩车被拖走泪洒街头？城管这群狗东西！什么，小偷超市偷盒饭被抓怒而将店员割喉？店员活该，对弱者的同情心在哪里！什么，患者家属泣不成声大肆医闹追打医生护士？一定是医生草菅人命，良心都被狗吃了！什么，男子手术后右肾失踪怒而上告？看看现在的医院，狼心狗肺胆大包天！什么，玩游戏被封号？狗东西，一定是作弊了，别的我什么都不听都不信！

对于这部分暴民，你们真的知道自己所知是否是事实的真相吗？你们做过最基本的信息采集与调查吗？你们也太容易被煽动被误导被带节奏了...

Great game. A lot of fun.

However, a friend of mine was banned in DBDL. The reason is that he installed a language patch into the game before the new version realease, after which he was not able to join in the game as a survivor for 95% of the time and was told to be banned later. I sent an appeal email to EAC, and they still have not replied. I have heard that they never reply, so I am not really expecting anything from them.

In a local forum of mine, I saw the Developers reply to someone who was questioning the fact that those reported cheating or tempering with game files have not been properly dealt with, like getting banned. Okay, so they mentioned that it takes time to ban someone because it has to be absolutely sure, and I understand. But first and foremost, could you not ban someone wrongly? As I turned to mods, I was told they and the developers are not able to deal with any bans happened already. So what could we do? A man paid full money on the game, and for his life has always done things with integrity even in the game, was now banned 200% for sure wrongly and could turn to no one for help because the EAC never reply and the Developers will simply spare the responsibility by saying “Sorry we can’t help, send an email to EAC???”. This is the annoying point. Okay I want to make this clear again and for the last time. He for 300% sure was merely installing a language patch, and did not do any single action that violated the rules, like cheating or tampering with the game file. If you said, that merely installing a language patch should be banned, then I accept, alright? If that is what you are telling me, then I give up. But just take a look at those cheaters, they are still enjoying their games with nothing happened. Ridiculous.

8.12
Okay I wanna make this clear. This negative review is only directed against the attitudes the Developers have been showing on dealing with wrong ban and appeal, and the fact that my friend was banned wrongly. This game, itself, is absolutely awesome with so much fun. However, this is like you are watching a tennis game with a full price ticket, and you got thrown out from the audience because the guy next to you threw a bottle into the pitch. I guess no one would give a positive review to the match in this case.

BEST GAME EVER

Dead by daylight is really fun! 
every killer got a uniqe playstyle. every character got their own perks that only they can use until you unlock it to all other suvivors/killers, which in my opinion is really good! the graphics are really good too! but, there is always a downside to everything... for me it is the wait time when you make a lobby as a killer, it could take upto 20 minutes until other people start to join your lobby... a match could be between 5-10 minutes long, it kinda makes me think playing as a killer isnt worth it... but the developers could fix this problem, they couldfor example make some sort of minigame that you can play or some other sort of entertainment while waiting.
everything is good otherwise and i absolutely love this game!
It's a pretty fun game, especially with friends to play it with.

Из обновления в обновление не могут пофиксить проблему, когда не получается деактивировать капкан поставленный под крюком с выжившим( Можно только снять его и, либо попасться самому, либо снять выжившего прямо в капкан) Разработчики же вместо того, чтобы заняться проблемами баланса продолжают бафать маньяков и, новая забава, заделывать окна в местах где раньше можно было убежать.

Ich persönlich finde Dead by Daylight ein super Spiel.
Wiederum verstehe ich jeden der sich darüber aufregt eine Lobby zu finden. Ich selbst bin auch mehrere Minuten in der Warteschleife, was einem die Motivation weg nimmt. 
Weiteres was einem stört, wenn der Killer aus der Lobby fliegt und man seinen Rang dabei verliert. 

Aber Schlussendlich zählt für mich der Spassfaktor. Mit Freunden kann es sehr Spass machen auch wenn man schon umgebracht worden ist.
Das Problem mit den campenden Killern kann man wohl schlecht beheben, da müssen die Personen sich selbst mal ändern :D 

Es gibt zwar noch einiges zum verbessern was die Lobbies angeht, aber ich schätze das die Entwickler dran sind :) 

Hoffen wir auf ein noch besseres Dead by Daylight :)

Bearbeitung vom 11.8.2016 : Inzwischen gibt es bei mir mehr Bugs als voher. Man kann diese als lustig bezeichnen, demotivieren aber als Spieler. Die dazu passenden Screenshots sind öffentlich und können somit von euch angeschaut werden. 
Meine Empfehlung bleibt aber noch bei "Ja" weil sonst ist es nicht schlecht.

Death is not an escape? I long for death, atleast that way I get some points...

I love this game, but it crashes so often and when it does you loose all points and items from that round.
When I first started this game, crashes were rare. The more I play the more frequent the crashes become.

It has now reached a point were it crashes 80% of the time. the other 20% of the time, it's because I have died.
It crashes when you are repairing a generator or healing someone.
Which means this game crashes when you're doing well.... and lets you die everytime... = Going insane.

I really do love this game and will continue to play it, but at this point, I consider this game to be like crack.... I know its eating my soul and driving me insane but I enjoy it.
I will continue untill the bitter end. I just hope the end is a patch and not my voluntary commitment to a Mental institution.
